performers

Class Rat

  • Object
    • performers.Monster
      • performers.Rat

  • public class Rat
extends Monster
    Everybody knows what a rat is. The version here is designed to beltch fire.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Get a Rat description.
        Specified by:
        getDescription in class Monster
        Returns:
